Posts.Content: Jan 30, 2012 04:13PM Nicole39 wrote: Jennifer,  I was dx with malignant pleural effusion Feb 2011. I had the talc surgery in march 2011. After that i had 6 rounds of taxotere, carbo and herceptin. The fluid hasn't come back, although i still have activity on pluera. I also had no symptoms of the effusion. i was stable on hercetpin following 6 months. Jan PET showed slight progression, but still no effusion. My point is...that was a year ago and im still here.  my onc never gave me a prognosis other than saying the national average is 3-5 yrs.  Wishing you the best of luck on wed. Stay strong! Nicole
